content: After the new xflags integration, cargo xtask install without any extra args does not install client automatically. is it intended to change this way or bug ?

Even cargo xtask install --client doesn't install the client so I would be surprised if it was intentional.
It seem that was caused by https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/7835
Currently it will only install the client if you explicitly specify the name of the executable for VSCode: cargo xtask install --code-bin code
